Text:
It's also possible to use Blizzards tracker for this, just get the downloader off off Starcraft2.com, open it in a hex-editor and copy and paste everything from "d8:announce" to the end and save that as a new torrent file

This should allow better download speeds in general.

This is Blizzards tracker: http://us.tracker.worldofwarcraft.com:3724/announce
